trans-unit.source: . [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 。[ハンノッシュ]

trans-unit.source: 1.0.9 - Unreleased
trans-unit.target: 1.0.9-未リリース

trans-unit.source: Adapted for Plone5 [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: Plone5[血まみれ]に適応しています。

trans-unit.source: Add Latvian flag to language list [maartenkling]
trans-unit.target: 言語リストにラトビア語の国旗を追加 [maartenkling]

trans-unit.source: Add Portuguese normalizer. [hvelarde]
trans-unit.target: ポルトガル語のノーマライザーを追加します。[hvelarde]

trans-unit.source: Add Python 2 / 3 compatibility [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 追加Python 2/3の互換性[pbauer]を

trans-unit.source: Add missing entries to requirements in setup.py. [dhavlik]
trans-unit.target: setup.pyに不足しているエントリをrequirementsに追加。[dhavlik]に不足しているエントリを追加します。

trans-unit.source: Added ‘`’ to the list of dangerous chars, which will be removed by the url and be replaced with a dash by the file name normalizer now. [hannosch, mj]
trans-unit.target: Added ‘`’ to the list of dangerous chars, which will be removed by the url and be replaced with a dash by the file name normalizer now. [hannosch, mj]

trans-unit.source: Added Polish normalizer which normalizes ‘dashed l’ to l. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6845. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added Polish normalizer which normalizes ‘dashed l’ to l. This fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6845. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added Romanian language as the language for the .ro TLD. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9152 [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: Added Romanian language as the language for the .ro TLD. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9152 [vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Added a new MAX_URL_LENGTH constant used by the URL normalizer. It defaults to 255. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: URL ノーマライザーで使用される新しい MAX_URL_LENGTH 定数を追加しました。デフォルトは255です。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added a new explicit base normalizer for Thai, as the Unidecode based transliteration isn’t good enough. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added a new explicit base normalizer for Thai, as the Unidecode based transliteration isn’t good enough. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added a new max_length argument to the normalize method. This allows you to override the default values for the maximum length on a call basis. [hannosch, fschulze]
trans-unit.target: normalize メソッドに新しい max_length 引数を追加しました。これにより、コールベースで最大長のデフォルト値をオーバーライドできるようになりました。[hannosch,fschulze]

trans-unit.source: Added a subdomain language negotiator (e.g. de.plone.org). [stefan]
trans-unit.target: サブドメインの言語ネゴシエータを追加しました(例:de.plone.org)。[stefan]

trans-unit.source: Added bulgarian normalizer. [vlado]
trans-unit.target: ブルガリア語の正規化を追加しました。[vlado]

trans-unit.source: Added catalan flag. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9540 [ramon]
trans-unit.target: Added catalan flag. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9540 [ramon]

trans-unit.source: Added cs-cz combined language code. It solves problem with default language on new Plone site creation (Safari/Mac). [naro]
trans-unit.target: cs-czを組み合わせた言語コードを追加しました。Ploneの新規サイト作成(Safari/Mac)でのデフォルト言語の問題を解決します。[naro]

trans-unit.source: Added missing ‘native’ descriptions to pt-* combined languages. [igbun]
trans-unit.target: Added missing ‘native’ descriptions to pt-* combined languages. [igbun]

trans-unit.source: Added missing ISO-639-1 language codes: ae, ak, an, bm, ce, ch, cr, cu, cv, dv, ee, ff, ho, ht, hz, ig, ii, io, kg, ki, kj, kr, kv, lg, lu, mh, nb, ng, nv, ny, oj, os, pi, sc, vk. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 欠落しているISO-639-1言語コードを追加しました:ae,ak,an,bm,ce,ch,cr,cu,cv,dv,ee,ff,ho,ht,hz,ig,ii,io,kg,ki,kj,kr,kv,lg,lu,mh,nb,ng,nv,ny,oj,os,pi,sc,vk.[ハノーシュ]

trans-unit.source: Added more tests. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: テストを追加しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added new UNDERSCORE_START_REGEX to the file normalizer. This removes any leading underscores from uploaded file names. Objects in Zope cannot start with an underscore, so it makes little sense to generate suggested file names which cannot work. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ファイルノーマライザに新しい UNDERSCORE_START_REGEX を追加しました。これはアップロードされたファイル名から先頭のアンダースコアを削除します。Zope のオブジェクトはアンダースコアで始まることができないので、動作しないファイル名の候補を生成するのはあまり意味がありません。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added new cctld entries for: asia, kp, ss and xxx. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: cctldエントリを追加しました:asia,kp,ss,xxx。[Hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added new country codes and flags for: bl, bq, cw, mf, ss and sx. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 新しい国コードと国旗を追加しました:bl,bq,cw,mf,ss,sx.[ハノーシュ]

trans-unit.source: Added new specific normalizer for Japanese, which avoids the Unidecode based transliteration. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9914. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added new specific normalizer for Japanese, which avoids the Unidecode based transliteration. This refs http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9914. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added normalization for a French-only character (igature of o and e) which isn’t part of ISO 8859-1. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7512. [dbaty, hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Added normalization for a French-only character (igature of o and e) which isn’t part of ISO 8859-1. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7512. [dbaty, hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added test for filename with non-ascii character and extension. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7128. [dreamcatcher]
trans-unit.target: Added test for filename with non-ascii character and extension. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7128. [dreamcatcher]

trans-unit.source: Added tests for the filename and url request adapters. We have now 100% test coverage. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ファイル名とURLリクエストアダプタのテストを追加しました。これで100%のテストカバレッジを持つようになりました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Added the Products.PloneLanguageTool on this package [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: このパッケージにProducts.PloneLanguageToolを追加しました [bloodbare]

trans-unit.source: Added the negotiation traverse hook for language negotiation [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: 言語ネゴシエーション用のネゴシエーショントラバースフックを追加しました【bloodbare

trans-unit.source: Added the reference to the Faroese flag. [deo]
trans-unit.target: ファーロの国旗への言及を追加しました。[デオ]

trans-unit.source: Added the tests from Products.PloneLanguageTool [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: Products.PloneLanguageTool [bloodbare]からのテストを追加しました。

trans-unit.source: Added three new countries and its corresponding flags. Also updated the internet top level domains list. Added countries are Kosovo, Montenegro and Serbia. [alecghica]
trans-unit.target: 3つの国とそれに対応する国旗を追加しました。また、インターネットのトップレベルドメインリストを更新しました。追加した国はコソボ、モンテネグロ、セルビア。[alecghica]

trans-unit.source: Adding all the Arabic-speaking countries with their respective flags, and adding a generic flag to represent Arabic in general (verified to be OK with two independent, native residents). [limi]
trans-unit.target: アラビア語圏の全ての国にそれぞれの国旗を追加し、アラビア語全般を表す一般的な国旗を追加しました(独立したネイティブの2人で問題ないことが確認されています)。リミ

trans-unit.source: Advanced i18n/l10n features
trans-unit.target: 先進のi18n/l10nの機能

trans-unit.source: Advanced i18n/l10n features useful in a CMS environment.
trans-unit.target: CMS環境で役立つ高度なi18n/l10n機能を搭載。

trans-unit.source: Allow _ as a valid character in file names and URLs. Do not remove # from file names. It only has a special meaning for URLs. [hannosch, sidnei]
trans-unit.target: ファイル名と URL で有効な文字として_を許可する。ファイル名から#を削除しないでください。これはURLに対してのみ特別な意味を持ちます。[hannosch,sidnei]

trans-unit.source: Allow calling getPreferedLanguage without parameter again [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: getPreferedLanguageをパラメータなしで呼び出せるようにした [tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Avoid infinite loop if buggy queryUtility() returns normalizer instance of wrong class. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/ticket/11630. [patch by Sardtok, applied by kleist]
trans-unit.target: Avoid infinite loop if buggy queryUtility() returns normalizer instance of wrong class. Fixes http://dev.plone.org/ticket/11630. [patch by Sardtok, applied by kleist]

trans-unit.source: Avoid loading of registry on BeforeTraversal breake the request [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: リクエスト[血まみれ]のBeforeTraversal breake上のレジストリの読み込みを回避する

trans-unit.source: Be more verbose when Japanese normalizer fails in tests. Test that the length of the returned string is lower but not always equal to the given max_length. Changed tested string. (#25)
trans-unit.target: テストで日本語ノーマライザが失敗したときに、より冗長になるようにする。返される文字列の長さが、与えられたmax_lengthよりも小さいが、常に等しいとは限らないことをテストするようにした。テストする文字列を変更した。(#25)

trans-unit.source: Breaking changes:
trans-unit.target: 変化を壊す

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: バグ修正。

trans-unit.source: Changed the default normalization of characters used in Scandinavian languages to meet the most common rules. This is based on a discussion with translators from all Scandinavian countries. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 北欧諸国の言語で使用される文字のデフォルトの正規化を、最も一般的なルールに合わせて変更しました。これは、すべてのスカンジナビア諸国の翻訳者との議論に基づいています。hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 変更履歴

trans-unit.source: Clarify and test availability of deprecated language codes mo and sh. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 非推奨の言語コードmoとshの利用可能性を明確にし、テストしました。[ハノーシュ]

trans-unit.source: Clarify and test availability of reserved country codes an and cs. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 予約された国コードanとcsの利用可能性を明確にし、テストします。[Hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Code Cleanup: isort, pep8, manual cleanup [jensens]
trans-unit.target: コードクリーンアップ:isort,pep8,マニュアルクリーンアップ [jensens]

trans-unit.source: Code and test cleanuo. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: コードとテストのcleanuo。[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Converted most tests from doctests to proper unit tests. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ほとんどのテストをdoctestsから適切なユニットテストに変換しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Copyright / Licenses
trans-unit.target: 著作権・ライセンス

trans-unit.source: Correct language code for Javanese from jw to jv. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ジャワ語の言語コードをjwからjvに修正しました。[ハノーシュ]

trans-unit.source: Depend on and include
trans-unit.target: 依存しており、含まれています。

trans-unit.source: Don’t allow double quotes in normalized urls. This closes http://dev.plone.org/archetypes/ticket/764. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Don’t allow double quotes in normalized urls. This closes http://dev.plone.org/archetypes/ticket/764. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Extend polish normalizer ‘dashed L’ to L. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6845. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Extend polish normalizer ‘dashed L’ to L. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6845. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fix py3 tests and functionality [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: py3のテストと機能性を修正 [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix regression in normalizer: handle POSIX locale identifiers in addition to IETF language codes. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 正規化器の回帰を修正した:IETF言語コードに加えてPOSIXロケール識別子を扱うようにした。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fixed does not correctly handle client HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE is language/country combination. [jianaijun]
trans-unit.target: クライアントのHTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGEが言語/国の組み合わせである場合に正しく処理できない問題を修正。[jianaijun]

trans-unit.source: Fixed test (don’t expect role from pac-tests). [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: Fixed test (don’t expect role from pac-tests). [pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fixed tests not to fail when a new country, language or domain is added. [alecghica]
trans-unit.target: 新しい国、言語、ドメインが追加されたときにテストが失敗しないように修正。[alecghica]

trans-unit.source: Fixed the IIDNormalizer to generate valid CSS ID or Python variable names as specified in its docstring. It no longer tries to preserve filename extensions. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9708. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed the IIDNormalizer to generate valid CSS ID or Python variable names as specified in its docstring. It no longer tries to preserve filename extensions. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/9708. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed the greek character normalization based on a patch by ggozad. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8308. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Fixed the greek character normalization based on a patch by ggozad. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/8308. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Fixed various native names of African languages. Added
trans-unit.target: アフリカ語のネイティブ名を各種修正しました。追加された

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 修正しました。
German URL normalizer: handle German ‚single‘ and „double“ quotation marks, em dash –, paragraph § and € sign. [jnachtigall]

trans-unit.source: ILanguageSchema
trans-unit.target: イルランゲージスキーマ

trans-unit.source: If a dot was used in a url, the url was not lowercased. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7961. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: If a dot was used in a url, the url was not lowercased. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7961. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: In practice the Unidecode data didn’t produce good enough results for various languages. We therefor limit the transliteration approach again to latin-like languages and introduce a UNIDECODE_LIMIT. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10107. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: In practice the Unidecode data didn’t produce good enough results for various languages. We therefor limit the transliteration approach again to latin-like languages and introduce a UNIDECODE_LIMIT. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10107. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Increase the maximum filename size to 1023 and make it independently configurable. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ファイル名の最大サイズを1023に増やし、独立して設定できるようにしました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Initial implementation. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 初期実装。[ハノーシュ]

trans-unit.source: Merged udg-sprint branch. This adds a Zope3-based configurable language negotiator with similar functionality as PloneLanguageTool. It is not enabled by default. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: udg-sprint ブランチをマージしました。これは PloneLanguageTool と同様の機能を持つ Zope3 ベースの設定可能な言語ネゴシエータを追加します。デフォルトでは有効になっていません。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Minor packaging updates. (#1)
trans-unit.target: 細かいパッケージの更新。(#1)

trans-unit.source: Move PTS Negotiator over form PlacelessTranslationService over to here in order to get rid of PTS itself. [jensens, ksuess]
trans-unit.target: PTS自体を取り除くために、PTSネゴシエーターをPlacelessTranslationServiceからこちらに移動させてください。[jensens,ksuess]

trans-unit.source: Move the interface
trans-unit.target: インターフェースの移動

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: 新機能を搭載しています。

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Products.CMFPlone
trans-unit.target: 製品紹介.CMFPlone

trans-unit.source: Products.CMFPlone.interfaces
trans-unit.target: Products.CMFPlone.interfaces

trans-unit.source: Register all dependencies in setup.py. Move test dependencies into a separate extra to keep the dependencies low so things like the normalizer can be used in non-zope contexts. [wichert]
trans-unit.target: 全ての依存関係を setup.py に登録します。テストの依存関係を別のエクストラに移動して依存関係を低くし、ノーマライザのようなものをzope以外のコンテキストで使用できるようにします。[wichert]

trans-unit.source: Remove more punctuation characters as for example using a comma in the title results in a not so friendly ID. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6585. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Remove more punctuation characters as for example using a comma in the title results in a not so friendly ID. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/6585. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Remove those [] brackets from file names as well. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ファイル名の[]カッコも削除してください。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed invalid me language code added in 2007. me is only a country code. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 2007年に追加された無効なme言語コードを削除しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed the negotiator sub-package, as it hasn’t been enabled or used yet. The functionality is better placed as a WSGI-middleware. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Removed the negotiator sub-package, as it hasn’t been enabled or used yet. The functionality is better placed as a WSGI-middleware. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed unknown cctld entry for um. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: umの未知のcctldエントリを削除しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Removed unused and untested ‘native’ from country information. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Removed unused and untested ‘native’ from country information. [hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Revert 97645c76f5e0cf14e525f702c66fe0c4de8cb0fc. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: Revert 97645c76f5e0cf14e525f702c66fe0c4de8cb0fc.[esteele]

trans-unit.source: The code in this distribution is copyright Plone Foundation and licensed under the GPL version 2 only.
trans-unit.target: この配布物のコードの著作権は Plone Foundation にあり、GPL バージョン 2 のみでライセンスされています。

trans-unit.source: The max_length argument was ignored by plone.i18n.normalizer.ja.Normalizer. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: max_length 引数は plone.i18n.normalizer.ja.Normalizer によって無視されました。[rossp]で無視されました。

trans-unit.source: The national flags icon set included in this distribution is copyright by Jakub Steiner (http://jimmac.musichall.cz/i.php?i=flags) and we have been given permission to include it under the GPL license.
trans-unit.target: The national flags icon set included in this distribution is copyright by Jakub Steiner (http://jimmac.musichall.cz/i.php?i=flags) and we have been given permission to include it under the GPL license.

trans-unit.source: This distribution depends on the Unidecode Python code by Tomaz Solc repackaged by Ben Bengart for setuptools. The code is a port of the Perl module Text-Unidecode-0.04 by Sean M. Burke licensed under the same terms as Perl itself.
trans-unit.target: このディストリビューションは、Tomaz Solc による Unidecode Python のコードを Ben Bengart が setuptools 用にリパッケージしたものに依存しています。このコードは、Perl 自体と同じ条件でライセンスされた Sean M.Burke による Text-Unidecode-0.04 の Perl モジュールの移植版です。

trans-unit.source: URLNormalizer now removes leading underscores. They are disallowed for content objects in zope. [do3cc]
trans-unit.target: URLNormalizer は、先頭のアンダースコアを削除するようになりました。これは zope のコンテンツオブジェクトでは禁止されています。[do3cc]

trans-unit.source: URLNormalizer should remove all ignored characters before making any substitutions. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: URLNormalizerでは、無視された文字をすべて削除してから置換を行うようにしています。[esteele]

trans-unit.source: Unidecode
trans-unit.target: ユニデコード

trans-unit.source: Update license to GPL version 2 only. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ライセンスをGPLバージョン2のみに更新しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Updating the flag/language listings. Updating readme to include the flag mapping logic. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7441. [limi]
trans-unit.target: Updating the flag/language listings. Updating readme to include the flag mapping logic. This closes http://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/7441. [limi]

trans-unit.source: Use
trans-unit.target: 使用方法

trans-unit.source: Use the flag of Bangladesh for the Bengali language (code: bn) in general and not only for the
trans-unit.target: バングラデシュの国旗は、ベンガル語(コード:bn)だけではなく、一般的なベンガル語の国旗として使用してください。

trans-unit.source: Use the standard libraries doctest module. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 標準ライブラリのdoctestモジュールを使用してください。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: Use zope.interface decorator. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: zope.interface decoratorを使用します。[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Wrote tests for the locale-aware id normalizer and fixed a bug in it. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ロケールを意識したid正規化のためのテストを書き、バグを修正しました。[hannosch]

trans-unit.source: and
trans-unit.target: そして

trans-unit.source: and the whole Plone stack. This also breaks the circular reference between those packages. [sallner] (#29)
trans-unit.target: と Plone スタック全体を参照することができます。これは、それらのパッケージ間の循環参照も壊します。sallner](#29)

trans-unit.source: based transliterations. These provide more meaningful results than unicodedata NFKD normalizations or hex codes. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: ベースの音訳。これらは、ユニコード化されたNFKD正規化や16進コードよりも意味のある結果を提供します。[Hannosch]

trans-unit.source: bn-bd
trans-unit.target: BN-BD

trans-unit.source: bugfix Shortname starts “b” in Japanese https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/2901 [terapyon] (#32)
trans-unit.target: bugfix Shortname starts “b” in Japanese https://github.com/plone/Products.CMFPlone/issues/2901 [terapyon] (#32)

trans-unit.source: from
trans-unit.target: から

trans-unit.source: language codes. Thanks to Dwayne Bailey and Roche Compaan. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: 言語コード。ドウェイン・ベイリーとロシュ・コンパーンに感謝します。[ハノーシュ]

trans-unit.source: nd
trans-unit.target: ンド

trans-unit.source: nr
trans-unit.target: nr
